Hi,

For a small demo i want to use the camera (of my laptop) with an external usb orientation sensor, and skip the markertracking for a while. But for some reason, i only get the camera image in the game view when i add a tracker, and the 3D object i want to display is lost from view. Is there a way to show the webcam image without using a tracker and use a regular scenegraph.Camera?
